entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
